name: Escape a Blowing Ship!
description:
In this isometric tactics game you have to leave a ship that is being invaded. 

It's a work in progress, we're planning to add music, a variety of enemies and map content as well as a boss! Let us know what you think!

Update Dec 6

It's my birthday and I took the day off to create some features for the game. I believe we got the basics done now we're going to add the polish. Let us know what you think!
